review_text: Very quaint accommodation with much to do in the immediate area and as well as surrounding areas.
Perfect place to stay for the night! Extremely clean, comfy bed, and felt much bigger than the photos look. Would definitely recommend!
Maria’s place was so clean and brand new! The neighborhood is so cute and full of things to do. We loved our stay here and will stay here again next time we are in the area!
Sleek moderate Airbnb. Super clean, and in a great location.
Great place to stay. Some great places to eat within just a minute or two walk. Very clean. Will look at staying here again in the future

Maria is the best!
Enjoyed our stay!!

We went to Lincoln to visit our son and had a very comfortable stay. Everything was just as posted on Airbnb stocked with everything, you'd need to make you feel at home. The location is wonderful with easy access to restaurants and shopping. Very clean and comfortable.
It was a fun location. It was noisier than we expected. The bed was comfy. It was a nice weekend get-away.
This place was exactly as described. It was very clean and had plenty of towels and supplies. There are local restaurants within walking distance of the apartment. I definitely will be back again!
We had a wonderful stay! Everything was perfect! Check in was easy. I highly recommend!
Would stay here again in a heartbeat. Extremely clean, great location, responsive host. Recommended.
The spot was just the perfect place to stay. Felt cozy and welcoming
The loft was a great pick for our weekend stay in Lincoln. It was a very clean and comfortable space. Host responsiveness was fast and friendly. Would stay here again a thousand times over.
Lovely place and nice neighborhood!

I loved this modern, clean, light and airy space to spend a few days! It was very comfortable and stocked with anything I might need, from kitchen supplies to toiletries. Close to breweries, restaurants and coffee. I will definitely stay here again!
this place is in an amazing location. very clean, great communication with host was easy, loved our stay!
We literally loved everything about this airbnb and will likely stay again in the future! It exceeded our expectations. The area was cute too which was a wonderful added bonus.

This place was exactly what we needed for our stay in Lincoln. It was very accessible to everything in south Lincoln. The apt is really cozy, very clean, and super comfortable. The little shopping area it's in is great. Steps away from an ice cream shop, a coffee shop, a chocolate shop, three tap rooms, and several restaurants--all very good. Parking was also super easy. Five stars all around!

What a cute place, and being situated above an ice cream place was the cherry on top! The place was immaculate, perhaps even brand new. It had everything we needed - fully stocked kitchen, comfortable bedroom, a living room with ample seating, a washer & dryer, and convenient parking. It was absolutely perfect!!
If you’re looking for a nice place, that’s very walkable to restaurants and bars and peaceful settings this is the place for you
Clean, easy to park, walkable to a few restaurants, easy to drive to other areas of Lincoln. It was a very easy place stop on a longer road trip. Bed was comfy and good water pressure in the shower.

Had a fantastic time, perfect base for my partner and I to explore Lincoln, Nebraska. Great interior design, large closet space, super comfortable bed!
Lots to do within walking distance and an easy drive to Sunken Gardens and other sites. Definitely check out Lulubee for chocolate confections!

The loft was fun and a perfect size for the two of us to land during our whirlwind weekend. The Creamery below is an incredibly popular place but the activity was not at all disruptive to our experience, which we wondered about. The bed was comfortable and the linens nice. The ceiling fans were a welcome addition for air movement during our warm stay. Filtered water in the fridge door saved us from having to buy bottled so environmental kudos! The decor was updated and calming. The location got us quickly to all major streets so moving around town was very convenient. We had a really nice stay and would stay again instead of using a hotel!
Super cute condo! Clean and well maintained in a great location! Will stay here again for sure! :) thank you!
Very clean and beautiful property.
The place was perfect for my wife and I. It was very clean. We felt very comfortable. Maria was very responsive and nice. Great options around to eat and find a drink.

My wife and I decided to stay here instead of a hotel while attending a concert at Pinnacle Bank Arena. Even though this loft is in the south part of town, it was a short easy drive to/from the concert, and it was so nice to have a clean, quiet place to come back to. Our only regret is not having time to try the ice cream shop! We will definitely stay here again.
A cute and clean spot to stay at in Lincoln! Within walking distance of a lot of shops and local restaurants. We will be back!

Great place to stay!! Walking distance to many places to eat. However I did forget for an hour or so to check my email which was the main way to communicate, but that was on me. Overall a great place and would stay there again if I get back up that way!!

Thank you Maria for having such a beautiful place for people to stay while in town. Everything was well equipped, wonderful colors and decor which provided a comfortable setting. I will for sure be coming back.

Really enjoyed staying at this AirBNB. The area is very nice, within walking distance to fun shops. The bed was very comfortable, and it was a quiet neighborhood. It was nice to walk downstairs right to Scooters coffee for my morning brew....

It was a very nice place and very clean and inviting. Had more than what we needed of everything such as towels and cleaning supplies for the kitchen and laundry. It was a very cozy place with a wonderful ice cream shop downstairs. Maria was very helpful and responded quickly. Would definitely stay here again.

Maria's place was just right for the location we needed to be in Lincoln. We liked being able to walk to many great restaurants. (Less than 5 min. to them) Maria's place was extremely clean and comfortable. Nice shower and comfy bed. Maria was quick to respond when we asked questions. This was definitely in our top airbnb's we have stayed at. We will return when we are in Lincoln again.
Beautiful loft in a peaceful spot in town. The ice cream shop was busy and understandably so, ice cream was delicious!
Beautiful little townhouse. Pretty cool being above an ice cream shop. Everything you need was there. Would def stay here again.
The loft was perfect for a weekend away! It was clean and cozy and exceeded our expectations!
Beautiful well equipped place, great location close to coffee shop, ice cream shop, restaurants and local brew pubs. Highly recommended
My second long stay at Maria's place and it was superb. Clean, excellent location, easy and prompt communication. I highly recommend!
This is our favorite place to stay when we visit Lincoln. It is very quiet, and clean. It is in a great location.
Beautiful place with great amenities!
Maria’s place was great!
I have stayed in many air b&b’s and Maria’s place was top 2. Very clean, quiet and in a great location. Highly recommend if you will be staying in south Lincoln!

Maria was responsive at all times. My month-long stay was totally easy, getting in, operating the appliances, you name it. I would highly recommend this for the location, walkability of local neighborhood and businesses, and the quality of light and functionality of the space itself.
Excellent location; close to breweries and restaurants. This is the perfect choice for a quick overnight trip or weekend away.
A great place…

My stay was amazing and so relaxing! This was my 3rd time staying here and I was 100% happy with how it went! Only downfall was I wished I had booked for 2 nights there instead of just 1! I will definitely book again!
Amazing location on top of the ice cream shop, and the home itself was brand new, beautiful, and cozy! We will be back!
Very nice/clean condo. Would definitely recommend.
This place was great! Very clean and great location!
Maria's place in Lincoln is very nice to stay in. It is comfortable and convenient for visiting places in Lincoln. We were very happy to stay there.
Great place, great location

This is the perfect place for us to stay in Lincoln and the second time we’ve booked it. We will plan to make this our go-to place when we come to town - it’s clean, comfy, stylish, and the location offers all the accommodations you need for your stay.

Loved this little place! Perfect side of town and I adore that it’s by a Scooters and 402 Creamery. With tv on you can barely hear people outside. I’ll definitely be returning to Maria’s for my next visit in Lincoln!

Transitioning to Lincoln and needed a place during the week for a couple of weeks. Maria’s place was absolutely perfect. Very clean, comfortable, quiet, and safe. Maria is very responsive and helpful. I couldn’t have asked for anything more. Thank you Maria*
Beautiful large loft. Super clean and great location. Coffee, food within walking distance.
This is an amazing space in a great part of town. Very clean and with all the top amenities. Maria is very responsive and helpful. Couldn’t recommend this host and spot more.
Maria’s place was very clean, exactly as the listing stated and good location. Maria was very easy to communicate with. Would definitely recommend and book again.
Wonderful place with a great location! So clean and has everything we needed! Will definitely stay here again when in Lincoln.
Maria's loft space was not only beautiful, but all of the thoughtful amenities made it very special. She is indeed a super host. Plus, be sure to visit the creamery downstairs!
Great location on a very quaint street. Everything we needed was there. It was clean and the bed was very comfortable. Will stay here again on future visits to Lincoln.

This apartment was so cute, clean, and cozy! The bed was very comfortable and the living areas were spacious. The location was also great; we were able to walk to brew pubs and grab coffee in the morning before heading out. I highly recommend this listing!

The best AirBnb my husband and I have stayed at. We travel to Lincoln often and have wanted to stay here a while and we're very pleased. The unit is in a great neighborhood that is close to resturants and shopping. The ice cream shop is fantastic. We will be sure to book again for our next trip!
Nice place! Very clean

Will be staying again! Place was super clean, comfy, and well furnished. The bed was very comfortable as well as the pillows. Very quiet area which meant we got a restful sleep every night. Highly recommend this airbnb.

This 1 bedroom apartment was the best unit I've ever rented! It was comfortable and relaxing. My wife and I loved it! The TV was great; the room was quiet enough for me to work from home there.
There's a coffee shop and an ice cream shop right next door. We were only 10 minute from downtown, and the traffic was much lighter.
It's situated in a commercial district with some shops nearby. We didn't explore much of them because we were there for an event.
This loft is a very nice place to stay. Cleanliness is always a top priority for me, and this really fits the bill! Location is great as well! Very reasonable pricing too!
This is such a nice and cute apartment! I didnt it stay in it much during the day but it was nice to come back to in the evening.
This is a great little place . Very clean and modern, comfortable bed, location is great , walk across parking lot to food and drinks , will stay here every trip to Lincoln if available
This place was stunning!! PERFECT location and very cozy.
Great stay. Would have loved to stay longer!
The unit was very clean and tidy! It was also a great location with easy access to everything we needed during our stay. Great communication with the owner!
Super cute and incredibly clean!
What a great place! We’ve already booked it for our next trip to NE later this year! Highly recommend it for your stay.
Great unit, close to restaurants and the best ice cream! Fully furnished with everything you’ll need for a weekend getaway or longer. Best place to stay in Lincoln!
This loft is fantastic and the location is one of the best in Lincoln. Definitely recommend for a pleasant getaway.
Such a wonderful stay! Everything was so clean & such a fun location. Highly recommend staying! We’ll be back for sure.

Great space, very convenient with wonderful restaurants in walking distance. Very clean with plenty of amenities. The only two things I didn’t love: in one of the photos it appeared there was a balcony which there is not in this particular unit, and then the other very minor thing for us was the space above the bedroom wall that opens directly into the kitchen, only because we were traveling with a toddler and like to keep the room dark when we’re up after she goes to bed… so that’s very personal to our situation and likely wouldn’t impact most people. Otherwise loved it and would stay again!
Great place to stay for a weekend getaway! The apartment was super clean and well decorated. It had everything we needed to cook a nice dinner. We enjoyed getting 402 Creamery downstairs
Very clean. Cute apartment in a cute walkable neighborhood. Maria was also very quick to respond to any of our questions.
Excellent place to stay!! This is my 50th state visited in USA and perfect apartment in Lincoln for my 1st night in Nebraska!! USA rules!

I couldn't have asked for a better experience at Maria's airbnb! The apartment was beautiful and clean and so comfortable. I truly didn't want to leave. I will definitely be renting this gorgeous apartment again from Maria!
Perfect apartment for singles or couples. Bed was really comfortable and the place was perfect. Great location with tons of things to do within walking distance.

Maria’s ice cream loft is exactly as advertised. So cute, extremely clean and in a nice, quiet area mixed with commercial businesses and residential homes. Bonus points too for having extra travel toothbrushes and coffee supplies in the place! I only stayed for one night but it made me wish I could stay longer. And yes, the ice cream downstairs is amazing!
One thing I would mention and it has nothing to do with the loft itself: I noticed there were no Ubers to be found when I needed to get to the Haymarket for a work meeting. I had a rental car so it wasn’t an issue. Not sure if it was a fluke but just a heads up either way.
Super clean apartment with great amenities and location! Maria was super responsive during our stay as well.
The apartment was charming and expertly furnished and equipped. The bed and bedding were really nice quality. We enjoyed the fireplace and the close proximity to the coffee shop!
Very modern, clean, and quiet area to stay at for the night!
Great location, easy to find and access. Clean and comfortable. We had a nice stay and would recommend!
This is such a unique and awesome place to stay. CLEAN! Which is a must for me. Scooters is right across the street. Quiet neighborhood. Highly Recommend.
It was gorgeous, and so much fun!
Super cute and clean space in a quiet and convenient neighborhood! I would definitely stay here again!

We had a really nice time! The place is very clean and has a nice calm modern atmosphere. All the buildings remind me of a cute ski resort which was fun! There were also lots of thoughtful amenities if you needed them and of course the ice cream is an added bonus! Thanks for the lovely stay!

This space is lovely! Very clean and comfortable, outfitted with all the things you need, even for a longer stay. My husband and I booked the space for a week-long stay to visit my family. We had all we needed in the kitchen to make meals, and enough space for my family to come hang out.
The location is also excellent - walking distance to several restaurants and bars, and there's a coffee shop right across the street.
Check-in and check out were smooth and easy, and Maria was very responsive (and very patient answering all my questions). This space is definitely going on our list of favorites!

I’m a regular Airbnb traveler and would rate Maria’s place as one of the nicest, best located, and real value of all the places i have stayed. The place was very clean, modern, had everything needed to feel at home, and just a few steps to restaurants and shops. Communication was great and fast too. I would highly recommend this wonderful loft.
Cute little place to stay! Seriously 30 feet away from Scooters! Good location for shopping and food!
A very nice place and got some ice cream downstairs!

Maria's place was perfect for my latest business trip to Lincoln. It was close to restaurants and other conveniences, well stocked with everything I needed to be comfortable, and near anything I could need.
So cute and clean!

This was exactly the place we were looking for to break up our drive from Colorado to Iowa! It was a beautiful space, clean, and the communication was excellent. There’s a scooters across the street and we were able to get coffee and get back on the road the next morning quickly! Would definitely stay again if we need to split up our drive!

We had an excellent stay at this location. The host was very fast with communication. The neighborhood was fantastic. Only two things we didn't care for.... the apartment was above a garage so could hear everytime the garage door opened and closed. There was also lots of echoing in the apartment which could be resolved with some simple sound proofing. Otherwise it was the ideal place to stay.
This place is fantastic! Maria has thought of everything and you can’t beat the location. Clean, cozy and comfortable!!
Maria’s loft is a delight! The location is great; the loft is very clean and fresh and well-appointed!
Very clean and in a great location!
Excellent stay!

If you have to be in south Lincoln, this is a cute one bedroom loft apartment. Know that there are STAIRS when you book here.
The kitchen has everything to prepare meals but there are plenty of options within walking distance.
It is pricy however, at least compared to the Residence Inn a block away (where we usually stay) but they were booked and our travel plans were not flexible.
Great small place in a cute neighborhood. Comfortable bed!
Absolutely wonderful apartment. Better than the pictures! It has everything you could possibly need and located in a nice, but quiet shopping center. Would most definitely stay here again.

The location is wonderful, it’s conveniently located to some good restaurants, breweries, there’s a coffee shop right across the street, and of course the ice cream shop. All of which were walking distance. There is also ample parking.
The loft itself is a very relaxing space, very clean, comfortable, easy to find, and easy to access.
It was incredibly cute and perfect! Felt more like home than home!
Very clean and comfortable. In walking distance to a lot of cool businesses. Beautifully furnished.

Two night stay was excellent. So easy to walk from the squeaky clean upscale loft to 402 Creamery (5 star), Boiler brewing (off the chart stouts), Lulubell Chocolates (works of art) and you can almost not leave and reach Scooters coffee. Just stay and explore
This apartment was perfect. We were able to get in easily, and it was in walking distance to great food, sweets, and coffee. Truly a 10/10 and will definitely be coming back.
This apartment is so clean and comfortable. We loved how close it was to different shops, including Scooters coffee.
Highly recommend staying here and going to the ice cream shop!
awesome location! very nice touches that were helpful for our stay. updated and modern.
Lovely place to stay!
Beautiful and brilliantly decorated as well as the perprioritor thought of everything you would need.
Great plave to stay and easy walking distance to good restaurants and coffee!!!
Maria was a wonderful host and the apartment was perfect. Very clean, conveniently located, and exactly what we needed after enjoying Lincoln! If you plan to visit, this is the place to stay!

Maria’s place was great! It was spotless and nicely decorated just like the pictures. It had everything you would need for your stay. We will definitely book again, if available, next time we are in Lincoln.

This loft is brand new and beautifully decorated! There is a wonderful ice cream shop downstairs and a coffee shop across the way. There is also a lot of walking and running paths nearby! Maria is an excellent communicator and the loft has a full kitchen for making any type of meal. There was plenty of parking and it was very quiet at night. We highly recommend this place if you are traveling to Lincoln!
Maria's space is lovely, spacious, comfortable and very well equipped with good amenities and a well stocked kitchen. Highly recommend it.

Such a cute, cozy and clean place!! Well appointed with all amenities, comfortable and well organized. The location is great with many eateries within walking distance.
Maria was easy and prompt with communication. Highly recommend Maria’s place for a hassle free and comfortable stay.
We would definitely stay again if we are in this area!

This place was so cute and SO CLEAN! The bed was cozy and the kitchen had everything we could possibly need. We would definitely stay again. Also, the ice cream downstairs is delish and the coffee shop across from it was wonderful too!
Beautiful apartment! Elegantly decorated, lots of windows, and spotlessly clean. Food and drinks within walking distance.
A beautiful spot close to lots of yummy, unique places to eat in walking distance!
Very nice apartment with new appliances. The apartment is located in an upscale neighborhood with several eating establishments within walking distance.
Really this deserves extra stars. Amazingly clean, great space, great location, and great communication. Highly recommend.
Beautiful and welcoming :)
Clean and cozy, great place to stay and easy check in!
Maria’s place is always clean and a wonderful place to stay! (My second visit) Nice area, easy to get to, and lots of places to eat/drink in the area.

This space is beautiful not only is it sparkling clean but has all the touches of a luxury hotel and more! The location is perfect there are so many great options for eating and drinking that are walkable. Great getaway even for those that live in Lincoln and have a special occasion to celebrate.

Maria’s place was beautiful, easy to find, local bars, restaurant and coffee shop within walking distance. The place was clean, cute and comfortable! We had a lovely time. Thank you, Maria!
PS. The complimentary cupcakes were delicious 🧁
A perfect place to stay. better than any hotel, quiet, spacious and clean. A great stay for a few days.
Stylish, new, clean and quiet with great communication and service from owner
Amazing stay! Very clean! It made our anniversary celebration extra special.

Our stay at Maria's place was so great! Her place was exactly as described/pictured and easy to get to. It was quiet, clean, comfortable, and very inviting. Her cupcake shop is adorable too. We were only there for a short overnight stay, but we would live to come back and stay longer!

This was my first experience with air b&b and it was amazing! Great location, super clean and very accommodating! Will definitely stay again if we get back that way. Annnnd... the cupcakes are delicious!
Wow! Stylish and cozy, in the heart of a newer suburban neighborhood. It was very clean and the bed was so comfortable. It was a great experience! We will definitely request to stay here again!
It was a great place for our group. We had a great time with all of the in-house activities to do.
The house is wonderful, I will leave a good recommendation for the great service and attention offered by the host, clean place and the jacuzzi great to have a good time between friends and family
We absolutely loved our stay and didn't want to leave. There was so much to do and the hosts were amazing. It was perfect! Thank you!

We loved this place. There was plenty to do and lots of places to relax and hang out. The outdoor area and hot tub were the perfect spaces. Amy was wonderful. She responded quickly and gave us lots of recommendations for town. We will be back for sure!!

Stayed for a girls trip and it was gorgeous. So many Insta worthy spots in the house. lots of space tons of activities and amenities. Full kitchen and bar supplies. Lots of games, movies, and even little treats. This place was perfect. Also want to note it is in a great location in a very safe neighborhood. Less than 5 mins to grocery, food, coffee and shopping.

This place was perfect for what we needed it for! Our group had a wedding in the Lincoln area and needed a place for myself and my friends to get to safely. The home is beautifully decorated, especially the backyard. We are so grateful and blessed to have found this home and it was a great privilege for all us. The kitchen was stocked with everything we could have needed and the instructions were all very clear. Our favorite thing was all of the labels throughout the house which made it easy to navigate. Thank you for the wonderful stay!
We had two kids staying there and the house was perfect for them! The only downside was how firm the mattresses were

This is seriously a hidden gem. FANTASTIC for families it had everything a family could need: bibs, kid dishes, sound machine, baby monitor, bath seat and toys, even baby shampoo. They had baby bottle brush, countless toys, stroller, wagon and even a booster seat. We were blown away by this amazing place. Great location in a safe neighborhood with grocery, coffee, and restaurants in under 6 min drive. 3 families stayed 7 adults and 5 kids under the age of 5. Something for everyone big and small. All of my questions were answered quickly and there were countless little touches that made our stay. Kitchen is fully stocked with all appliances you could need. Plenty of bedding and towels with 12 people we went through so many towels and never ran out. Lots of storage areas to tuck items away. The hall closet even had a shoe rack for all the kids shoes. We could have stayed for a month but sadly all we had time for was 1 unforgettable weekend. We will be staying again!

The location was great. It was easy to get to and not on a busy street. The kitchen was well stocked with coffee supplies and cooking equipment. Amy was fast to respond and communicative with instructions and house information. We would definitely stay here again!

The New Nostalgia house was perfect for our weekend getaway for Easter to visit with relatives. The hot tub was great after a long car ride and to wind down the day. We took advantage of all the amenities including the large side and backyard with hammocks and plenty of seating. Also the downstairs kids room and TV area was great for our 9 year old, she was ready to move in. All in all it was a great experience there. Would highly recommend it.

The New Nostalgia House is such a wonderfully thought out place. My family enjoyed it and since it is close proximity to family members who live nearby, we hope to come back when we have a large family gathering and need an extra place to stay. I highly recommend it. Thanks so much, Amy!
Seriously one of the best Airbnbs I have stayed in! Great host and awesome amenities!
It was a lovely place! Thank you.

Amy was great and the home was absolutely beautiful. Everything was as described and in working order, which is a huge plus in our book!!! we would definitely recommend the New Nostalgia House to others.

The New Nostalgia house was even better than described. Clean sheets, plush towels, plenty of extra blankets. The furniture was comfy and inviting. The kitchen worked great and had plenty of dishes and utensils. I wish we would have had more time to enjoy the backyard. It was perfect for sitting outside with friends while the kids played. The hot tub was wonderful! Amy was super responsive to my questions and check-out was so easy! I can’t wait to stay the next time we’re in Lincoln!
We have stayed here before! We come back because it's a great place, with great hosts!
One of the best Airbnb stays that our group has had-- the house was amazing and the amenities offered were top notch!! Highly recommend this place!
Thanks Amy. Will stay again if ever in the area.
Amy communicated the information we needed to know well and was easy to work with. We loved the location of the Nostalgia House and it had plenty of space and entertainment for our family.

The new nostalgia house was a nice getaway. I feel that the host tried to think of everything you might need while you were there from infants needs to adults cooking hotdogs over the fire or playing cornhole in the backyard. The flow of the house is a little cumbersome at times, but very manageable with a little patience and effort. We had 8 adults there for three days, and overall had a really nice weekend and felt pleased with our decision to stay there.
House is perfect for me and my crew. We will definitely be back soon.

This was a beautiful and comfortable little home. It was smaller than I expected, but everything was really nice, and I loved all of the little things they have to offer in the home. The kitchen has about every appliance or item you would need, except maybe an air fryer (sounds silly I know) and a speaker for music. It’s a cute little place and the host was very responsive.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. So many extras throughout the house! Can’t wait to come back!!
Amy's place accommodated our needs during our stay. We will definitely be back soon.

We were not able to stay at Amy's airbnb because of a snow blizzard that lasted several days! However, Amy was instrumental at helping us cancel our reservation and contacting the airbnb personnel to get out refund. THANKS Amy!
Loved this home! Beautifully styled and comfortable beds and atmosphere ◡̈ Amy was a wonderful host

This was the perfect place to stay while visiting family in Lincoln. It was just two of us but certainly a whole family could comfortably enjoy the home. The decor and cleanliness were on point. We didn’t get to enjoy the amenities due to the cold winter weather but would love to stay here again so we can!

1. We appreciated how clearly and easily everything was labeled.
2. Wide variety of things to do just on the property, no need to go anywhere else to find things to do.
3. The kitchen offered everything necessary to cook and or bake.
4. The hot tub was wonderful.
5. Towels, blankets, seating, and parking are abundant.
6. Property is correctly represented on the AirBB website.
7. Plenty of room for private conversations or whole groups to gather.
8. Amy was super easy to communicate with and gave clear responses to all questions.

The house is so adorable. Our daughter loved playing with all the toys in the kid room. Kitchen is well stocked! Beds were super comfy. The dining room in the kitchen is super tiny, it was problematic eating in the same space together, but otherwise great place.
We had so much fun and loved the place! Would definitely stay here again!
It is a very nice house. Very clean and well stocked. We would definitely stay there again!

We love the Nostalgia House! Nice, clean, and super friendly, helpful hosts! We loved the location, peaceful and quiet neighborhood. We absolutely loved the outdoor area! The ambiance of it all was great! We will definitely be returning soon!
We will definitely be staying again when we come back with our kids if it is available!
Beautiful home, Amy was very responsive and kind. It was the perfect space for our stay!

This was a top AirBNB stay, in my opinion. It was extremely clean and we felt right at home. Amy thought of everything in the decorations to honor Lincoln and also a few local treats to try. Everything was stocked so well, we weren't in need of anything. Such a great space to stay, and the beds were comfortable!

Clear, concise communication from Amy prior to check in and after check out. House was exactly as described. Super clean, comfortable and welcoming. Perfect accommodations for a group of friends in a quiet, well maintained neighborhood. Will definitely keep New Nostalgia House on our short-list for future trips to Lincoln.

Our stay here was incredible! The house and all the amenities were great. Very accurate pictures and descriptions of the place. We especially loved the hot tub and all the games! The decor was so charming and they had everything we could’ve needed for our stay. Check-in was seamless and the area was great as well. Close to lots of shopping and dining options. We will definitely remember this place for future stays!

Loved New Nostalgia.
Loved the hot tub.
Loved the fully stocked kitchen.
Loved the weights in the finished garage.
Loved all the outdoor and indoor seating spaces.
Loved how close it is to Union College and Target!
Loved Amy and her communication/efforts to make us feel right at home.
Cannot wait to return!

The accommodations at New Nostalgia for our girlfriend trip were perfect! The home
was very clean and had lots of room for the 5 of us. Amy was easy to communicate with and responded in a timely manner. Would stay here again!

This is one of the best Air BnB’s we’ve ever stayed in! Our family felt right at home, and Amy thought of every last thing you may need! So thankful for her kindness and care on our really special trip. Would 100% recommend you stay at this beautiful home.

Truly am amazing experience. This host thought of everything. Perfect place for kids, with the added touch of lots of toy options. The entire backyard experience was top notch. One of the best stays I’ve ever had.
Beautiful home and great place to stay!

Enjoyed the stay in Lincoln at the new Nostalgia House. Everything not only as described in the listing, but better. Our reunion group was quite comfortable and 3 bathrooms and 4 bedrooms are a definite plus for a bunch of women! Best AirBnB I’ve stayed in and would stay here again when visiting Lincoln. Thank you

Thank you for the great stay in Lincoln while we celebrated a family wedding. Really appreciated the amenities and kid-friendly touches the house had. My kids want an awesome finished basement just like this house had!
Again, our family thanks yours.
We had a wonderful stay at Nostalgia House. The beds were very comfy, and we really enjoyed the relaxing hot tub soaks before bedtime. I would definitely stay here again.
Everything about this place was amazing, you won’t regret booking with Amy! :)
Amy’s place was a perfect home away from home. It had the cutest coffee bar and the everything we needed was included in the home. The decor made it cozy and there was plenty of space to spread out.
amy was a great host! her home is beautiful and so clean. she made several recommendations that were very helpful and she was very responsive.

We were in Lincoln for a family wedding and New Nostalgia was perfect for our family to relax and enjoy each other's company between events. Having many indoor and outdoor spaces made the house great for reading, watching a movie, playing a game or catching up on work emails. Five ways to make coffee! The personal touches and decor made it a home. Thanks for everything, Amy!
Beyond comfortable ! Great stay !

Our family enjoyed spending time at Nostalgia House. Amy was wonderful to work with. She provided all the information we needed and even had recommendations to places to visit. The house was a great space for our family to relax and spend time together. We enjoyed the outside space including the peaceful deck, roasting marshmallows by the fire pit and relaxing in the hot tub. The kitchen had everything we needed to make meals and the kids enjoyed playing games in the game space. We had a great weekend and we will definitely let other now that the Nostalgia House is a great place to stay and Amy is a great host.
Awesome place to stay. Extremely clean. We enjoyed tremendously would recommend to anyone!

Wow is all I can say!! This is by far the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in! Amy is an amazing host and has thought of literally everything. As an Airbnb host myself I was literally taking notes on how to step up my game! She is not only friendly, but the house is worth the higher cost. If this house is open do not hesitate and book now before someone else does!

What can’t I say about this place! Amy and Todd were very accommodating and responsive from the moment I reached out to them. New Nostalgia place feels like home away from home. The detail they put into making their guests feel comfortable and cared for exceeds expectation. The home is charming and is filled with thoughtful and beautiful curated pieces throughout. Each member of the family is considered with amenities ranging from high chairs and toys and cribs for littles all the way up to those who enjoy a good workout, a serene patio experience, through comfortable beds for those of all ages. Amy responded to my questions throughout our stay immediately and went out of her way to leave a kind note and a thoughtful snack upon our arrival. I would love to stay at their place again. It was a privilege and amazing experience through and through. Thank you Amy and Todd for making our little family reunion so special!

We were in town to visit family and we felt this was very much like home with an extremely well equipped kitchen, and very comfortable spaces both indoors and out. We stayed three nights and wished we could have stayed a couple more to enjoy all of the many amenities. We hope to come back and do so!
It was amazing! We wish we had more time to stay there. It was a much needed respite! Thank you for such a wonderful experience.

Awesome spot. We were in town for a friend’s wedding. Amy’s place was just big enough for a handful of couples to have their own space. We didn’t even have time to use all the amenities, but the hot tub was a fun place to hang out in the evenings. Things were thoughtfully layed out and very clean.

We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Nostalgia House. Amy sets a high standard for Airbnb! She thought of everything. The decor was classy, tasteful, and modern. You will want for nothing while staying at her home. I will return.

Beautiful house, filled with everything we needed and more! Great extras for babies and kids which made our stay much easier and enjoyable overall. Excellent communication and easy access to Lincoln. Highly recommend!

This is a wonderful place to call home for your visit. The house has everything you could ever need to feel comfortable. The host was so helpful with local recommendations and how far I was from the family we were visiting. My family felt very at home and we will for sure be staying here again. Thank you!
The hosts have thought of ever amenity imaginable! I loved everything about this home and truly did not want to leave.
Was our 2nd time to stay here while doing a job in downtown Lincoln. We would recommend staying here for work or vacation. The host was, as before, very responsive and helpful.

We used it as a home away from home while we were in the area for other commitments, and it worked very well for us. Great hosts and great place to stay. We did feel very much like we were at home. I highly recommend it.
We absolutely loved our stay. The house is so cute and Amy was so nice and easy to work with! I cant wait to stay there again!

I don't even know where to begin. This house. So awesome. My family of 4 plus my husband's parents stayed in this slice of heaven. My kids are 16 and 8.
Hot tub: amazing. Clean, and we were able to adjust the temp to be perfect for us.
Hammocks: so delightful that one in our group thinks they should be counted as beds.
Fire pit: Tucked away for quiet conversations, with the perfect furniture.
Kitchen: Most well stocked with equipment and supplies that I've ever seen. She even thought of a vegetable peeler. Lovely dishes, beautiful set of pots and pans, high quality knives, delightful coffee bar, and a lamp!
Game/party room: Just so, so well done. Great games, perfect set up.
Kids' bedroom: such an outstanding selection of furniture, toys and books. One of my favorite rooms in the house!
Hosts: Amazing! No one does it better.
Bottom line? Book it. This is THE place to stay in Lincoln. Who wouldn't want to stay in a place Pinterest is jealous of?

Amy's place was absolutely wonderful!! We arrived late at night, and Amy had some inside and outside lights on, which made us feel very safe and welcomed when we arrived! The house is very clean and comfortable! The beds are comfortable, the kitchen is very well stocked! We made use of the hammocks & hot tub! The downstairs area is so comfortable too! We had a family game night downstairs with the games provided! So much fun! I felt very safe in the neighborhood going for my walk in the mornings. We used the outside porch area a lot! We enjoyed our last dinner on the back patio with other family members grilling steaks on the grill (that is provided). AND, to put the cherry on top of everything, there is literally a BEAUTIFUL huge Cherry Tree in the backyard that Amy encouraged us to use, so with our steak dinner, we topped it off with cherries for dessert!! What stands out the most is Amy's thoughtfulness in all the details of the house and her kindness with so many things!!!
We will for stay here again if we are back in Lincoln

Our stay was amazing! It’s a beautiful home. From the ample seating in the front room, to the intentionally decorated room's and ample hangout space downstairs, awesome backyard, we had everything imaginable for a memorable trip. Thank you so much for making out family’s first trip to Nebraska a phenomenal one!
All the best, Austin Banks and Family

This home was very nice and clean. It was close to a lot of different stores. It had great amenities and spaces for people to spend time together. We also appreciated that Amy was responsive at all times and added a personal touch by leaving a welcome note (and the best gummy bears I’ve ever had!) The only regret we have is not staying longer. Would definitely stay here again!
Thank you, Amy. We had a wonderful time at New Nostalgia. We especially appreciated how kid friendly the home is.

We were welcomed by a personalized thank you note and snacks for the kids. Place was great and my kids thought it was the coolest. Everything was included, games, coffee bar, cookware. Beds were some of the best I’ve slept in and overall the place has a very relaxing and refreshing vibe.

I stayed in New Nostalgia home last weekend for a reunion with frineds...4 of us total. The home is spacious and comfortable for spending time there visiting inside in the 2 living rooms and in the backyard in the hot tub, hammocks or on the deck. There are plentiful amenities in the kitchen such as coffee and teas, ziploc bags for leftovers, and just about every gadget you'd need for meal preparation. Bedroom and bath linens were soft. Laundry facility had everything too including an iron and ironing board. The garage holds outdoor games, such as corn hole and an oversized Connect 4, as well as weights and yoga mats for working out. Instructions for the TV were easy to follow as well as contact-less entry and departure. Amy responded quickly to questions ahead of our arrival and left friendly, welcoming notes for us. Expectations for cleaning up for departure were reasonable too. I'd certainly stay here again at our next return to Lincoln!

One of the best Airbnbs we have ever stayed at - very well-stocked kitchen with ALL the utensils and cooking supplies, beautifully decorated spaces, super soft towels, and wonderful outdoor spaces to enjoy! Loved every minute and wished we could’ve stayed longer! And the hosts were very responsive, accommodating and sweet. We would love to come back here someday. HIGHLY recommend.

We can not say enough about this Air B&B. The host is so thoughtful in their preparations for their guests. Our family had a wonderful time! We enjoyed our meals outside on the deck and the kids had plenty of toys and games inside and out to keep them busy. Our older kiddos enjoyed their workout in the garage gym and the hot tub was perfect! You can tell how much the host truly desires to spoil their guests. We were so thankful for the prompt delivery of a coffee press, complete with local coffee, when we discovered we left ours at home. Just amazing!!
Really nice house and had a great time!
Amazing stay! House was beautiful. Amy was wonderful and extremely accommodating.

Amy and Todd’s place was perfect for our staycation. Great spot with lots to do in Lincoln and our young kids (ages 0-5) loved the space as well—so wonderful to be in such a kid-friendly home! Only bummed we couldn’t stay longer. Cannot recommend Amy and this space highly enough!!

Amy's place is amazing! It is a warm, inviting and beautifully furnished and decorated home that feels like a home away from home. The backyard, with the patio, fire pit, kid's play area and the inviting hot tub are fantastic additions to this lovely place. Amy is a wonderful and friendly host who helped our stay in Lincoln to be more enjoyable.
Much nicer than expected,we will stay here again!
What a very unassuming place! It has everything you need and setup great for families. The extra touches and the care they put into the place makes this one place we will visit when we are in town.
Wonderful place! We would definitly stay there again!!

Absolute wonderful stay! This house has such a warm and at home feeling. Our family enjoyed every moment of our stay and my girls LOVED the downstairs area to hang out, watch movies and play games. We enjoyed our time in the hot tub. The weather got too cold while being there to hang out in the awesome looking hammocks and to use the fire pit but rest assure next visit to Lincoln those things will be first on the list to do!
Amy is an absolute pleasure to work with and so accommodating to any need you may have. She has also made certain the home is clean, stocked with any item you can think of needing, and provided a sweet little surpise!
We can't think of a better place to stay or better person to deal with. Until next time New Nostalgia ❤️🖤
The Hagerty's

Amy and Todd’s New Nostalgia House is the best Airbnb we have stayed at, and we have stayed at many here and overseas. Nothing is missing. Like coffee? Your options are pour-over, Keurig, expresso maker (Italian stove-top) or coffee pot. (Plenty of teas too!). Have children? The kids room downstairs is designed just for them. Babies or toddlers? Baby bath, toddler potty seat, step stool , kids plates, etc. Older kids? Games—board and Nintendo. Adults? 2 big screen tvs. And the hot tub is fantastic! It snowed so we didn’t check out the beautiful outdoor fire pit and other backyard capabilities. But they are all there. In other words , there is nothing we could have wanted that wasn’t there. The house was spotless, beds so comfortable and whole house beautifully decorated. If I could give this a 10, I would. And the next time we are in Lincoln visiting family we hope to stay here again. Great for families or small group of multiple friends. You won’t be disappointed!

This house was absolutely adorable! Such much attention to detail. The backyard space with the hot tub and lounge areas are such a great touch to the house. Honestly wish I could live in this house for myself, love it!:)
Absolutely amazing love, absolutely amazing host. Couldn’t have asked for a better experience!

We stayed at Amy’s home for the Christmas holiday. We can’t say enough great things about this place. From the thoughtful extras (candy, popcorn, Christmas tree and decorations) to the amazingly comfortable beds and fully stocked kitchen Amy has thought of everything. It was the most “at home” we’ve felt while staying at an Airbnb. Amy was very responsive throughout our stay and went out of her way to make sure we were comfortable. Although we didn’t get to enjoy the outside area (it was negative 15 when we arrived) it seemed like it would be a great place to relax when the weather is warmer. I highly recommend staying here if you’re visiting Lincoln-you will not be disappointed!!

We came to Lincoln for a wedding reception. This house was a perfect location for our family. Easy access to anything you need. Owner is very responsive. Kitchen is supplied with anything you need. Beds were comfortable. Very clean. Hot tub was perfect for the cold weather we endured. Definitely would stay here again.

This was our second stay and I think my daughter said it best the day we left: “I don’t want to leave! I love it here!”. So cozy and welcoming, looks just like the photos, but the attention to detail, when you’re in the space, makes it apparent why Amy and Todd are super hosts. Always so responsive and thoughtful to our life situation with kids. We are so grateful to have had this place to stay as our house is being worked on! Thanks, Amy & Todd!
Beautiful home. A great stay
Thoughtful and amazing. Clean and bright with the perfect touches of artistic taste. Comfortable yet elevated. What a perfect place for our family to rest!!

New Nostalgia was everything I hoped it would be and Amy & Todd were over the top helpful hosts! The home lives up to the photos and even better in person. The only “problem” was that we didn’t want to leave! The house made us feel totally at home. The amenities contributed to that feeling. We come to Lincoln frequently from Texas and need a place to stay to visit our college student, son. It was an easy drive to UNL and many wonderful restaurants. The neighborhood is quiet and safe. I live in Texas now, but am a native Nebraskan and have spent a lot of time in Lincoln. New Nostalgia is perfectly located, ideal for families, staycations, Husker game weekends, etc…We can’t wait to return on our next visit! There aren’t enough words to express how much we loved New Nostalgia! Until next time…

We had a great stay at the New Nostalgia house. The house is perfectly set-up for a comfortable stay in Lincoln. Amy is a great host and communicated with us through every step. We will definitely keep the New Nostalgia House in mind next time we come back to Lincoln.

We had a lovely stay. It’s a very neat and clean home. We spent a lot of time hanging out in the basement as it’s a perfect lounging spot.
It also has a fiber optic connection from ALLO. We were there for work and it was very fast and reliable.
Thank you!

Great Airbnb experience. It’s exactly as pictured with so many details included. Amy’s great communication added to the ease of the stay. You can clearly tell that she and Todd have put their heart and soul into their Airbnb. Great place to stay in south Lincoln!

Great house has everything you would ever need. When we travel with family, we typically choose an AirBnB over a hotel as it’s much easier to be together. This house hits it out of the park.
There really is nothing to change as everyone who stayed with us commented on how nice the accommodations were. Excellent job, I wish every AirBnB was this nice.

The New Nostalgia House was wonderful in all aspects.. we were a big group and never felt crammed for space. I absolutely loved this house, it should get 10 stars ⭐️ Amy covered every detail you would ever need and more. One of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed at! The hot tub area with hammocks and outdoor patio were so nice for relaxing and that basement was a great place for all of us to come together watch tv and share stories. We hope to get welcomed back one day.. #GBR thanks so much!

There are no words for how impressed I am by this property as well as Amy.
Communication was fantastic
The photos don’t do the home justice. Her sense of style, creativity, and attention to detail are apparent EVERYWHERE- even how she has the dishwasher pods organized.
The kitchen is beautiful and has everything you may need or want.
Bathrooms have hairdryers, toiletries, and emergency items you may have forgotten.
The hot tub works and it gets hot!
There is a gym in the refinished garage.
The basement area is huge and has games that came in handy.
There are multiple outside seating areas that really add value.
The mattresses are firm and supportive.
Access to the home was easy with the touch keypad.
This is .5 miles from Union College- easily within walking distance.
The neighborhood was safe and well established.
I would highly recommend this property and Amy! I have no doubt that whatever she touches will be high quality and beautiful.
We hope to stay here again in the future. ❤️Jeanice

Amy and Todd's haven is beautiful! There are so many lovely and well thought out spaces for groups of varying sizes to gather. The gaming system and the hot tub were a big hit with our teens! The home is as described and pictured or better! The kitchen is also well equipped. The local treats (popcorn, licorice and coffee) were a nice surprise. The home is located in a great spot in South Lincoln, with great proximity to many awesome spots for dining or take out: Copal (Mexican), The Mill, LaMar's Donuts/Colby Ridge Popcorn & Ice Cream, Bagels and Joe, Taco Inn and Butterfly Bakery, to name a few. This Airbnb is as nice as any I've stayed at.

Had a great time at Amy and Todd's New Nostalgia House. The house is as adorable on the inside as it is on the outside. The hot tub, kid’s playground and hammocks makes this a standout Airbnb for families. Amy was quick to respond to all of my questions. I needed to extend my stay and Amy worked with me to make it happen. The kitchen is well stocked with everything you need to make a gourmet meal. The house is located in a safe neighborhood. We spent a morning walking around the College View area. Discovered a good coffee shop, breakfast place and Mexican restaurant all within walking distance. We had a family emergency and Amy was able to book us a couple extra days around another family. When we moved back in, the house was just as clean as our first visit. New Nostalgia House is a 10/10 Airbnb.

The New Nostalgia home is a place you will want to stay if you are in Lincoln, Nebraska! Clean comfortable and all of the right touches! Super fun for the two boys (8 and 5) and lots of special features for the adults. Wished we could have stayed longer!

Absolutely loved this place. In addition to all the amenities like the hot tub and kitchen items, the owners went above and beyond to provide everything needed for small kids like a cups, dishes, safety gate for the stairway, high chairs, lots of books and toys, etc. lots of extra toiletry items in case you forget some thing. They truly thought through everything intentionally to make sure people have a great stay. You can’t beat the location if you are going to be doing anything in South Lincoln. We will definitely be back!

The New Nostalgia House is a home away from home. Amy and Todd had everything you could think of and more to accommodate our stay here. We traveled with a 4 month old and the thought they put behind our weekend was so wonderful and shows the heart behind the owners of the home. They had a crib, monitor, toys, bottle brush, baby bath, and sound machine set out for our sweet baby. They even had a little tub of baby food for her. Knowing our baby would’ve been taken care of whether we forgot something or not is such a peace of mind for a mom traveling with her baby.
The house is beautiful and accommodating for large groups with so many gorgeous hang out areas and amenities, but the kindness and heart shown in the owners is greater than anything you could ask for. The world needs more people like them. My group cannot wait to stay here again.
Great stay, great space, clean, beautiful, and appreciate the little details.

Our stay was wonderful! Amy communicated clearly and provided specific descriptions of everything we would need. She also provided local places we could visit and great recommendations. The house was cozy and had many accommodations for a variety of activities we chose to do. I would strongly recommend this house and the hosts to any friends or relatives. They made us feel cared for and a top priority.
We enjoyed our 2 night stay for a Husker weekend. The home was in a good location, had good amenities, clean and the hosts were super easy to work with.

Amy and Tod have one of the best Airbnbs we have ever experienced. They have thought of everything a guest might need or wonder about the area. Their place was absolutely beautiful, inviting, restful and perfect in my opinion!! I highly recommend them to ever!!
What a beautiful place to stay! Amy was incredibly responsive to any questions. New Nostalgia is well stocked and an absolutely blast and I will be trying to stay here any time I am in Lincoln!

The place was really awesome, truly everything we could’ve asked for. Excellent location, wonderful aesthetic, plenty of things to do to pass the time if needed. We’ll definitely be back if the place is available for next year’s trip to Lincoln.
This is the cutest air bnb ever!! Everything was so clean and so homey. We have two kids and Amy literally had everything we could’ve possibly needed! By far the best air bnb we’ve ever stayed at!!

This house made mine and my families trip everything we could’ve asked for. We traveled with a toddler and it had all the amenities needed. It was also set up to make any adults stay comfortable and relaxed. We very much enjoyed our time in Lincoln at the Nostalgia House! Definitely will be coming back when I’m back in the flatlands!

Amy's home is by far the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in. She literally thought of everything when creating this wonderful place for people to stay and enjoy. The neighborhood is quiet and friendly and the home is in a great location. Our family absolutely loved the many areas of the backyard and patio and spent a lot of time there. The house is super cute and comfy. Amy's communication is top notch!

I cannot imagine accommodations that would be more convenient, comfortable, and practical for our family stay in Lincoln. The home was immaculate and everything I needed for a week long stay was there. We made dinner for a large family gathering in preparation for our daughters wedding and there was space for everyone to sit and enjoy the company of the family. When we return to Lincoln to visit family again, the availability of this home with Amy and Todd as hosts will be a large part of the consideration of when we visit.
I love this place! ❤️❤️❤️

This house is a masterpiece. Amy and Todd went above and beyond to create a unique housing experience. Simply, our trip to Lincoln was a memorable trip largely due to The NN House!
Highly recommend.

New Nostalgia truly has everything. Traveling with kids is hard, and traveling with extended family is hard - but not here!! Parents with littles, this stay has it all: baby monitor, baby bath, bibs, cups, toys, a play set... it was fantastic to not have to worry about whether or not we forgot something! And our large group loved the common spaces, especially on the deck. We agreed that staying at New Nostalgia was so much better than staying in a hotel where you're separated by floors, have to gather in uncomfortable common spaces, and store food in awkward situations. None of those inconveniences crossed our minds at NN!! We cannot wait to return to this beautiful and relaxing location!!!

We had an amazing stay at Amy’s. Hands down one of the best airbnbs we have stayed in, and we have stayed in a lot! Her attention to detail is truly outstanding. She had so many extras I can’t begin to list them all. Toys and stuff for kids, a gym in garage, lots of extra toiletries under the sink, coffee, teas, and so many more! The best part for us was how kid friendly it was. It is a perfect set up for those with small children. Amy is a delightful host and super helpful and friendly. We had no issues at all during our stay and the communication before, during, and after our stay was great. We will definitely stay again in the future when in the area. Highly recommend!!

The New Nostalgia House is a beautiful home in a beautiful neighborhood. We went for the weekend with friends to ride bicycles and visit some local breweries. The house is near bike trails which we were able to take along with side roads to go everywhere we wanted to go. When we were at the house we sat outdoors most of the time enjoying the amazing outdoor space. Amy and Todd really did think of everything to make this a perfect place to call home during our stay. It was a great weekend spent with friends. We highly recommend their slice of heaven and hope to stay again in the future.

The house is comfortable and well equipped with everything you need plus more. Everyone in our group felt that it's one of the nicest places they've stayed. Will definitely stay here when in Lincoln in the future!

This home was perfect! Best AirBnB we've ever stayed in!
Amy made us feel like family. We were in town for a family funeral. We felt so at home in Amy's house that we really relaxed and focused on being together as family.
Really, we couldn't think of anything else she could do to make the stay better. The home is beautiful, came nearly as fully stocked as our own home, and with too many attentions to detail to list.
We worked out in the garage gym space, played Cornhole & on the swing set, lounged in the hammocks, played video games on the big screen and board games at the table down stairs, we bbq'd & enjoyed the relaxing back patio, entertained the little ones with adorable toys, cooked in the well stocked kitchen with ease, and slept well on the super comfy beds.
The ONLY reason I would hesitate to give this a great review is that I'd like to be able to stay here again if we visit Lincoln -- and selfishly hope there will be "room in Amy's inn".
Thank you so much Amy and Todd! Hope you get much joy out of hosting!

5 STARS. We had a great time at Amy’s place. The communication was super easy and quick and the place looks exactly like it does on the pictures. The neighborhood is very conveniently located, and perfect for a quiet evening in the backyard. The house was very clean and well stocked. We could not have asked for a better location. Overall a wonderful place; we would stay here again easily!
Great location and place. Building was so convenient to Haymarket and UNL. Loved everything about our stay and would definitely stay here again.

This condo is stunning! Great central location and has everything you need. Comfy beds with beautiful linens, a well appointed kitchen, easy to access and we had no issues with finding parking even though it was Graduation weekend at UNL. Loved our stay and can't wait to return!

The place itself was excellent and looks exactly like the photos and the hosts even left a hospitable note and snacks. Unfortunately it was much more difficult to find parking than previous reviews suggested and the location was on a very busy street above a bar, so it was quite noisy very late into the night on a Friday and Saturday. Perhaps should have been expected staying downtown.

This place was immaculate and beautifully decorated. My wife loved it, and she's an interior designer. Daryl and Sally thought of everything that a guest would need from drinks in the fridge and snacks on the counter to instructions on how to use the higher tech items. Even a little first aid kit in the bathroom. The condo is perfectly located downtown close to Haymarket and tons of restaurants. But the location is a double-edged sword and the only section I took off one star. On the weekend, there is a lot of nightlife traffic and even though the condo is on the 5th floor, you can still hear it quite a bit. Not Daryl and Sally's fault the builder didn't use better soundproof windows. Just bring some earplugs if you're a light sleeper. Not a huge deal, though. We do plan to rent this condo again in the fall when we stay in Lincoln.
Daryl was an amazing host! So hospitable, the home was spotless and designed beautifully. He left beverages, snacks, and very cool games for me to enjoy. Top tier host!
You’re going to wish you could make Daryl’s place your place after staying here!

Very luxurious space. We have stayed at many AirBNB’s, but never one that was designed with such quality. The unit came with everything one would need and was extremely clean. The couches, bed and linens were very comfortable. The location is also perfect walkable to everything in downtown Lincoln as well as UNL campus. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Lincoln. The host also communicated proactively and left some personal touches like snacks and drinks.

The condo was immaculate and very comfortable. On check in, I found a handwritten note and some snack provided for me. The bed was super comfortable. They also provided items to use for several just in case situations like extra toothbrush kits and grooming kits, and umbrellas and ponchos at the door.. plus more. Even being off a major street it never got super noisy. And it was within walking distance to a parking garage and to the event I was attending at the Bourbon Theater. Wonderful place with wonderful hosts. I would definitely stay here again!

Our stay at Daryl’s condo was nothing but perfect! The description was precise, great furniture, super cozy and amazing location near to the best spots in downtown. Instructions were very helpful and crystal-clear for checking in and out. Everything was super organized and well thought out, as well as little personal touches that made us feel even more at home! I can’t suggest this condo enough, great experience for anyone visiting Lincoln!

This place was fabulous! It was much better than the pictures displayed. The place was spotless, and the owners thought of everything. We stayed there a week and had no issues. Their attention to detail was amazing. The condo was tastefully decorated with high-end features. I definitely recommend this place.
Amazing place! They have thought of everything to make your stay enjoyable!

The condo was absolutely breathtaking! For example the amenities! The snacks on the counter, drinks the fridge, and the coffee selection was very sweet! The directions were very clear on how to check out and the way they had everything organized and labeled was also very helpful! It was very fun and modern and a really cool view from the windows! All the furniture and sleeping areas were very comfortable as well! I highly suggest anyone to stay here. It’s a great location in Lincoln!

Daryl is a spectacular host! There was literally so many personal touches that just makes you feel right at home! The building was very easy to find, and nice security which is a comfort to us! My husband and I were celebrating our 10 year anniversary and the hosts were kind enough to leave a personalized note and chocolates, which made our day! All in all we'd rate this condo a solid 10. The place was immaculate and it still felt so welcoming. We felt right at home in Daryls Lincoln condo. Definitely would stay there again!

This was the perfect place to stay when visiting Lincoln! The apartment was easy to find, with readily available parking after a long drive. The flat was completely spotless, had all the amenities required and every piece of furniture was comfortable to relax on! The blackout blinds also meant I got a really full sleep.
It's within striking distance of the Haymarket and downtown areas, with an array of good restaraunts and bars. As I was in town to visit friends, it was the perfect location. During the day it was an easy walk to Memorial Stadium, the State Capitol and shopping.
Daryl was polite, friendly, and so thorough with the instructions I barely had to ask anything - but he responded quickly when I did.
Would absolutely recommend staying here if you visit Lincoln.
This place is so cozy and beautiful. We spent a lot of time inside last week with the sub zero temperatures. We had everything we wanted and more. Good communication and lots of thoughtful touches.
it was a nice place
Great spot close to everything. Host was great to work with!

Great location in the old LES building, downtown Lincoln. Beautiful apartment & thoughtful amenities. Appreciate the snacks, drinks & personal hand written note to us. King bed was very comfortable. Great instructions, especially for parking. Both city parking garages are close & easy to navigate. Daryl was a great host! Highly recommended & we will stay again!
Loved this spot conveniently located in downtown Lincoln. Will absolutely be back!

Absolutely a Great space! We've never stayed in a place that had so many luxurious features.
The building/condo was easy to access (secure) and had a very private feel as well. It was within walking distance of all sporting venues in town.
A very comfy bed, and an awesome Living space with a 75 inch TV with all the viewing options out there! Remote control blinds, fans, & lighting controls with a fully stocked and wonderful kitchen area too!
Ultra modern, fantastic furnishings, and a very, very, clean space.
Great communication and assistance was consistently provided by the owners.
This will certainly be our next stop when coming back to town!
Great place to be in the middle of all the action.
Felt like we stayed in a 5 star hotel. Highly recommended.
Nice place in a great location! Would stay there again!
Very clean, very good instruction and meet every expectation.

Beautiful condo in downtown Lincoln close to everything! This condo is walking distance to UNL and Haymarket Area. I've recently hurt my knee and didn't realize what we were signing up for lol

I didn't see anything in the listing about it, but it's on me for not reading through all of the reviews beforehand. There are also a few other reviews, regarding parking, host communication, and rodents that freaked us out.

When we stayed in Lincoln, the weather was hot (over 100) even at night and humid (~ 60%), there was only one small window AC in the bedroom which could barely cool down the bedroom, and so the living room was hot all day long. Lisa offered to bring another window AC, but due to our crazy schedule, I didn’t see that message until the end of our stay, which was a bummer. If you are a hot intolerance person, you may want to give Lisa a heads up before you arrive.
